isConnected

public boolean isConnected(plugins.IPlugin plugin1,
                           plugins.IPlugin plugin2)
Method determine if plugins plugin1 and plugin2 are connected. Used for determining connections between cpu,memory and devices.

Parameters:
plugin1 - Plugin1
plugin2 - Plugin2
Returns:
true if plugins 1 and 2 are connected; false otherwise
